videos.title: Movie Pushpa 2 - The Rule | Official Trailer
videos.description1: Pushpa 2 - The Rule - Written and Directed by Sukumar. Produced by Naveen Yerneni and Y. Ravi Shankar of Mythri Movie Makers in association with Sukumar Writings. The film stars Allu Arjun, Fahadh Faasil, Rashmika Mandanna, Dhanunjay, Rao Ramesh, Sunil, Anasuya Bharadwaj & Ajay Ghosh. The film's music is composed by Devi Sri Prasad, with cinematography and editing performed by Miroslaw Kuba Brozek and Navin Nooli respectively.

videos.title: Movie Agni | Official Trailer
videos.description: Agni - Official Trailer | Pratik Gandhi, Divyenndu | Prime Video India
videos.description1: In a city engulfed by a mysterious surge in fires, Vithal, a courageous fireman, and his brother in law, Samit, a hotshot policeman, begrudgingly join forces to unravel the escalating crisis. As they battle their own differences and a race against time, they must reconcile personal conflicts to crack the case and protect Mumbai from impending disaster.
videos.description2: Prime Video India Presents,Agni Official Trailer,Starring Pratik Gandhi, Divyenndu, Jitendra Joshi Directed by Rahul Dholakia, Amazon MGM Studios presents, An Excel Entertainment production Official Release Date Dec 6, 2024 on Prime Video India.

videos.title: Entertainment: K-drama for mental health?
videos.description: K-drama for mental health? Binge on, one expert says 'Watching K-dramas can help people reconnect
videos.description1: 'If you've ever binge-watched an entire season of a K-drama like Squid Game, one Korean-American expert has good news: it's likely improved your mental health.
videos.description2: If you've ever binge-watched an entire season of a K-drama like Squid Game, one Korean-American expert has good news: it's likely improved your mental health.
